name: Vietnamese Japanese Dictionary
description: This is a Vietnamese-Japanese and Japanese-Vietnamese dictionary for Vietnamese&Japanese users.If you have any feedback or bugs to report, feel free to contact me via email: jsubmitter88[at]gmail.com  T in ny c vit vi mc ch gip cho nhng ngi ang hc hay l cng vic c lin quan ti ting nht d dng hn trong vic tra cu.c bit d liu  c convert li kh nh gn nhng m khng h thua km cc b t in vit - nht ang c trn PC. Ngoi ra tnh nng nhn dng ch kanji s gip cho bn tra cu kanji mt cch nhanh nht !  Nu c bt k ng gp hoc thng bo li th bn c th lin lc v a ch sau: jsubmitter88[at]gmail.com hoc vo fb page: http://goo.gl/KaeXYd Rt vui lng khi c gii p thc mc ca cc bn.   Tnh nng c bn:  Tra t, xem history, thm vo favorite  Nhp t bng ging ni  Nhn dng ch kanji vit tay  Tra t bng romaji  Ti thm d liu (menu => DictionaryManager)   D liu  Vit nht ~ 55000 t (c sn)  Nht vit ~ 73000 t (c sn)  Nht anh ~ 280000 t (phi ti thm t Dictionary Manager)  1945 kanji words   Ch : Khi v kanji nu v ng th t th kt qu s chnh xc hn C internet kt qu s ng hn   Link to apk: - Phin bn 3.0.4 http://goo.gl/cjmVju  - Phin bn 2.2.1 (dnh cho cc my cu hnh yu 2.x) http://goo.gl/vbrEob   File ci t dnh cho my c b nh trong nh, (t download t in bng tay t download manager)  - 2.2.1 http://goo.gl/hvrhFp   Recent Changes Version 2.1 - Add Kanji dictionary (1945 kanji words) - Add backspace button for draw kanji - Add new google ads banner (support me by clicking on google ads)
